definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub

sentences.english: The crown is the source of oxygen, worker of the magic of photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 樹冠是氧的來源，是神奇光合作用的製造者。

sentences.english: And from the wood-top calls the crow, through all the gloomy day.
sentences.chinese: 灌木飛出松鴉，烏鴉在樹冠上叫喚。

sentences.english: In the logo, the many parts of the crown represent the multiple values of forests.
sentences.chinese: 在徽標中，樹冠的多處地方體現了森林的多種價值。

sentences.english: The fir tree is black at the trunk, white out at the edges.
sentences.chinese: 冷杉的樹幹是黑色的，而樹冠則披着白色。

sentences.english: Adult langurs spend most of their day in the forest canopy feeding on leaves.
sentences.chinese: 大多數情況下成年葉猴都在林地的樹冠上採食樹葉。

sentences.english: The cultivar has ramose crown and upright tree appearance.
Pruning, by removing part of the top, alters this ratio.
sentences.chinese: 修剪通過剪除部分樹冠而改變根冠比。

sentences.english: Overhead the chestnut branches were covered with blossom.
sentences.chinese: 栗子樹在我們頭頂撐開綴滿繁花的樹冠。

sentences.english: Tree canopy of the large yard has basically been able to cover most of the Department.
sentences.chinese: 槐樹的樹冠很大，基本上能蓋住院子的大半部。

sentences.english: The tall, slender, Carolinian Forest provides a high canopy for the bustling forest bed.
sentences.chinese: 修長的卡羅萊納州森林爲林土層提供高高的樹冠。

sentences.english: Tree crown come off tree trunk, what kind of pain will it be?
sentences.chinese: 樹冠脫離了樹身，那是什麼樣的疼痛？

sentences.english: Octagonal-shaped crown set with blue cabochon crown.
sentences.chinese: 八角形錶冠設置藍色凸圓形樹冠。

sentences.english: The green roof of leaves above sighed at every rare and passing breeze.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾一縷清風掠過，碧綠的樹冠就發出聲聲嘆息。

sentences.english: The quantitative variation and distribution of the leaves on the canopy were studied too.
sentences.chinese: 研究了樹冠上葉量的變化及分佈。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
